title: Saving Levi
description: I dated her best friend in high school. That makes her an automatic no-no. Don’t go there, right?Wrong.I can’t stop thinking about her.We’re friends. Best friends. She’s the one I can talk to. Guy like me, in this life, that’s priceless. Especially since I just was discharged from the military with an injury that’s changed my life.She’s precious to me, but I can’t go there.Right?The only problem, I can’t stop thinking about her.
author: Kaci Rose
